description:
Bristol Cloud Native & DevOps are excited to announce our next installment; 'The Future of DevOps' - A Panel Discussion

Some of the topics and talking points will include:

- DevSecOps
- Assurance
- Evolution of DevOps
- Infrastructure as Code & Layered Testing
- AI and ML as a pathway to DevOps

As usual, we will run this during lunch-time and will last approximately one hour, with around 10 minutes left towards the end for audience questions.

Our panelists are:

Keith Watson - Director of DevOps at ADP - https://www.linkedin.com/in/keith-watson-00b90015/?originalSubdomain=uk

Tash Norris - Head of Security at Moonpig - https://www.linkedin.com/in/tash-norris/

Giles Williams - Head of DevOps at DOps Digital - https://www.linkedin.com/in/williagi/?originalSubdomain=uk

The event will be facilitated b Simon Minton - Global Cyber Security Advisor - https://www.linkedin.com/in/simonminton/

If you have any topics you are keen to hear about please drop me a message.
title: 'The Future of DevOps' - A Panel Discussion
